ingredients.item: ½ x 190g pack Waitrose Sun Drenched Tomatoes, drained, chopped
½ medium red onion, thinly sliced
½ x 115g pack Waitrose Baby Spinach, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Cut a thin slice from the top of each pitta and open to create a pocket.
In a large bowl, mix the remaining ingredients and season with black pepper.
Warm a griddle or non-stick frying pan over a high heat. When hot, press each stuffed pitta firmly down onto the pan for about 1 minute on each side, in batches, until warmed and golden.
